sentences.sContent: This kind of type is characteristic of nonskid stops on wet roads.
sentences.sContent_eng: This kind of type is characteristic of nonskid stops on wet roads.
sentences.sCn: 这种轮胎的特点是在潮湿的路面上不打滑。

sentences.sContent: And stair should choose sort of durable, nonskid , normally can label makes clear stair applicable.
sentences.sContent_eng: And stair should choose sort of durable, nonskid , normally can label makes clear stair applicable.
sentences.sCn: 而楼梯则要选耐用、不滑的种类，通常会有标签注明楼梯适用。
